text: Fuyuko, what kind of idol do you want to become?

Come on Producer
I've been telling you, just call me "Fuyu."

Haha... my bad.
──Anyway, how about it?

Like specializing in performances, or appearing on variety shows.
I don't mind if you haven't thought it through or anything.

What kind of idol does Fuyu want to be...
......

...Sorry
I enjoy all kinds of work, so I'm not really sure how to answer...

...──I see. Sorry, asking so suddenly.
Even if you need to take your time, I'd like you to think about it.

I'd like to help you think through all of the possibilities
and decide what kind of idol you want to become.

── I understand.
Thank you very much, Producer-san♡
